comment.author: 21734563@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 66406516@N08
comment._content: The photo description given here is incorrect as to unit designation and location. This is Captain Edward J. Jones's 11th Battery, Massachusetts Light Artillery on the Taylor farm, Petersburg, VA. The photograph was taken on or about June 21, 1864. Mathew Brady's hat can be seen just above the right shoulder of the man standing in the left foreground.
